    <item>
      <title>CVE-2025-12358 The ShopEngine Elementor WooCommerce Builder Addon plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site ...</title>
      <description>The ShopEngine Elementor WooCommerce Builder Addon plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery in all versions up to, and including, 4.8.5. This is due to missing nonce validation on the "post_add_to_list" function as well as an incorrect permissions callback in the "Api/init" function. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to add or remove products from a user's wishlist via a forged request granted they can trick a site's user into performing an action such as clicking on a link. | CVSS Score 4.3 (MEDIUM)  </description>
      <pubDate>Wed, 03 Dec 2025 13:16:00 GMT</pubDate>
      <link>https//nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2025-12358</link>
      <guid>CVE-2025-12358</guid>
    </item>
  
    <item>
      <title>CVE-2025-12887 The Post SMTP plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to authorization bypass in all versions up to, and ...</title>
      <description>The Post SMTP plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to authorization bypass in all versions up to, and including, 3.6.1. This is due to the plugin not properly verifying that a user is authorized to update OAuth tokens on the 'handle_gmail_oauth_redirect' function. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber level access and above, to inject invalid or attacker-controlled OAuth credentials. | CVSS Score 5.4 (MEDIUM)  </description>
      <pubDate>Wed, 03 Dec 2025 13:16:00 GMT</pubDate>
      <link>https//nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2025-12887</link>
      <guid>CVE-2025-12887</guid>
    </item>
  
    <item>
      <title>CVE-2025-13109 The HUSKY – Products Filter Professional for WooCommerce plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Insec...</title>
      <description>The HUSKY – Products Filter Professional for WooCommerce plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Insecure Direct Object Reference in all versions up to, and including, 1.3.7.2 via the "woof_add_query" and "woof_remove_query" functions due to missing validation on a user controlled key. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber level access and above, to insert or remove arbitrary saved search queries into any user's profile, including administrators. | CVSS Score 4.3 (MEDIUM)  </description>
      <pubDate>Wed, 03 Dec 2025 13:16:00 GMT</pubDate>
      <link>https//nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2025-13109</link>
      <guid>CVE-2025-13109</guid>
    </item>
  
    <item>
      <title>CVE-2025-13342 The Frontend Admin by DynamiApps plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of ...</title>
      <description>The Frontend Admin by DynamiApps plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of arbitrary WordPress options in all versions up to, and including, 3.28.20. This is due to insufficient capability checks and input validation in the ActionOptionsrun() save handler. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to modify critical WordPress options such as users_can_register, default_role, and admin_email via submitting crafted form data to public frontend forms. | CVSS Score 9.8 (CRITICAL)  </description>
      <pubDate>Wed, 03 Dec 2025 13:16:00 GMT</pubDate>
      <link>https//nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2025-13342</link>
      <guid>CVE-2025-13342</guid>
    </item>

    <item>
      <title>Cette fusée chinoise a presque égalé SpaceX, avant d’exploser en plein atterrissage</title>
      <description>![CDATA[
La Chine avait rendez-vous avec l'histoire, et le propulseur de la fusée Zhuque-3 avec le sol. Événement spatial de ce début décembre 2025, l'entreprise chinoise LandSpace a fait voler sa nouvelle fusée pour la première fois. Mais le résultat est contrasté  la mission spatiale a été un succès, mais le retour sur Terre du booster s’est soldé par une spectaculaire explosion.
]]>  </description>
